price: 36. Worden de ongelovigen niet betaald voor wat zij deden?
arabic: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: hal thuwwiba al-kufāru mā kānū yafʿalūna
